weapon_description: An elegantly built polearm, said to have been a conductor's baton wielded by a great musician to bridge tune and taste.
weapon_skill_description: ATK is increased by 24%. When the equipping character is off-field, ATK is increased by an additional 24%. After initiating healing, the equipping character and the character(s) they have healed will obtain the "Sweet Echoes" effect, increasing their ATK by 64% for 3s. This effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is off-field.
